node.title: When Translation isn't Enough: How to Communicate Present Truth Cross-Culturally
node.description: Whether by many or by few, it is only God and His method that will result in end-time mission success. God has modeled what true missionary work looks like—He came and dwelled among us and used imperfect human speech so that human beings with dulled senses could comprehend His love and understand His plan to restore us to perfection. God’s communication model is sinner-centered. We will demonstrate how this type of communication can be applied in cross-cultural settings with anecdotes and stories from our time living in South-east Asia.
